website_summaries.verdict: This traditional brown rubber wedge is sturdy and looks professional, making it a great fit for office environments or classroom buildings.
pros: Features a ridged upper face for grabbing the door and wide base design to avoid slipping
This classic wedge doorstop is functional while maintaining a professional, uniform appearance in office environments
The 1.2-inch profile is large enough to fit most door gaps
Durable and will hold up to frequent use
cons: The non-scratch base works fine on most surfaces, but may slip on some non-textured surfaces such as linoleum or hardwood

customer_reviews.title: The door stoppers were in great condition when we received them and are a great ...
customer_reviews.text: The door stoppers were in great condition when we received them and are a great product. We ordered them as a deterrent for opening classroom doors at our school in case of an intruder. Unfortunately they slip on all the floors, whether carpet, tile, or wood when you push on the door.. So what we ordered them for they don't work. That is the only reason I gave it 4 stars. They hold the door well, but not when pushed by someone try to get in the room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely good door stoppers for Commercial business
customer_reviews.text: These door stoppers are perfect for our doors here at work, but they tend to be a little higher than some standard home doors, so not quite sure how well they work in all situations. We mainly use them on carpet and tile for meetings in conference rooms or for janitorial to clean the restroom floors. Great price for the product.
customer_reviews.author: Tina McKillip

customer_reviews.title: Great Door Stoppers
customer_reviews.text: These rubber door stoppers remind me of the brown rubber kind we had when I was a kid. The style is improved with a wider base to give more stability. They don't slide on our wood floors which is a big plus for me. I did need to wash them with soap and water because they were coated in some kind of manufacturing oil. Overall, I do recommend them and would buy again if I need more.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and seller
customer_reviews.text: Great product and seller. I got an email the very next day after receiving them. They explained that they are a small home based business and how they take pride in their products. They really do. This product and model is much larger than the average cheaper ones that you normally find in the stores. You can't go wrong for the price. I really like the customer service already. Buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Quijano

customer_reviews.title: Fine but tricky
customer_reviews.text: After some use they get a flattened area in the middle and they are a little hard to keep in place in uneven flooring. I have to make sure to push them hard under the door or they slide out from the brick.
customer_reviews.author: Kae See

customer_reviews.title: Door Stopper Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty and effective, the door stoppers were economical and I pack one with me for all of my trips (to use to prop open hotel doors that automatically close. No complaints on this end and I gave 3 away as practical gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Mocha

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I live in south Texas where we have no topsoil to speak of, and I do a lot of gardening using big terra cotta pots. These door stoppers do an amazing job of holding pots level on uneven ground. For whatever reason, they’re very hard to find around here, so I ordered them. They were reasonably priced, good quality, and arrived in a timely fashion. Will definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Poodlelady48

customer_reviews.title: Good service from the seller too
customer_reviews.text: Just rubber door stops, nothing more, no moving parts, nothing to break, but they do the job. We moved to a new house in the mountains and with the windows open the upstairs doors get blown shut all the time. These solved the problem. Good service from the seller too, they arrived just a few days after ordering.
customer_reviews.author: JLP

customer_reviews.title: Pretty small
customer_reviews.text: Nice door stoppers, but they were much too small for what I needed. They were to hold the doors open at the school, so the marching band could carry their equipment in and out. They're too short to hold the door though. If it were a normal door in a house, they'd probably be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Fantasy Fan

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great value, great product, great seller. Company is great. Kept me updated about the product. I will say that they are oily. I wish I had read more reviews just so I was prepared! When I say oily, I mean almost wet feeling. As I had purchased 30 for a work project, it was a bit daunting handling all of them. I'm sure it's because of the rubber material. It didn't affect their purpose at all. Just wasn't expecting it.
customer_reviews.author: Southernmommaof2

customer_reviews.title: It was like getting three free
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at the quality of the stopper. I had used a rubber stopper which became torn and unusable. These are made of a hard plastic and do not cut from the bottom of the door. The package of five cost less than two of the previous used rubber stoppers. It was like getting three free! I would greatly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: David Medeiros

customer_reviews.title: So Far, So Good.....her Puppy hasn't EATEN any.....YET
customer_reviews.text: These were a Christmas Gift and will HOPEFULLY last until Spring, when the Breezes Blow through HER HOUSE and shut her doors. We expect these things will DO THEIR JOB.....Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: John E. Rice

customer_reviews.title: They work as good door stops as well
customer_reviews.text: These are door stops... used to stop doors from closing. They work. They work well. Guess what? They work well at leveling outdoor benches that use still tubes on unleveled ground. I keep these in my travel trailer just for that. They work as good door stops as well. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ArnellTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Great Height
customer_reviews.text: We have one door that has a clearance a little higher than normal and it fits perfectly. So far our youngest dog hasn't eaten any of them! We try and remember to pick them up when they aren't holding a door ajar/open.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Robinson

customer_reviews.title: They ended up being exactly what I needed. I ...
customer_reviews.text: They ended up being exactly what I needed. I was afraid they would be too short, I no longer have carpet. They are plenty tall enough and also wider than what I had from a wal-mart door stop. They did have a smell to them and an oily coating when I got them. Overall they work.
customer_reviews.author: James K. Guinn

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These door stops do the trick. No more relying on pieces of cardboard wedges or full trash cans to prop doors open. Customer service is great too. Received a thank you message from the vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service follow up
customer_reviews.text: This is a strong door stop. The item is well manufactured, the quality is excellent. I recommend it and the company has an excellent customer service giving follow up to the order
customer_reviews.author: Pito

customer_reviews.title: Then put one of these rubber triangles in there and you'll be fine. On a more serious note
customer_reviews.text: Do you need your door to stay open? Then put one of these rubber triangles in there and you'll be fine. On a more serious note, I use it on linoleum and it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: E. Mesa

customer_reviews.title: Good Door Stoppers
customer_reviews.text: Great price and they are what I wanted. They were a little oily but I wiped them off and they work great with our doors without marring the bottoms of the doors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty they are not.
customer_reviews.text: These so called "Heavy Duty Rubber Door Stops" are anything but. For a light door they would suffice but they would not do a very good job on heavy duty doors. They are pretty flimsy and not heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: james j alexis

customer_reviews.title: Good quality item
customer_reviews.text: These door stops are sturdy grade and were delivered at the time promised. The delivery driver did a great job finding the building.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Keeps doors open.
customer_reviews.text: just as advertised. Great shipping! Would recommend to others. Bought this to keep doors open in our home as our cat likes to close them thus shutting himself in room or bathroom while we are out.

customer_reviews.title: Effectively stops doors from closing!
customer_reviews.text: These are door stops. They are slightly rubbery and not completely stiff so they stop doors from closing effectively. Color online is true to life.
customer_reviews.author: JMGMRJM

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: These door stops are exactly what I needed. They are heavy duty, and they should keep my dog from pushing the doors shut and locking herself in a room. The price and receiving five stops in a package was great! I would recommend these door stops to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: DJS

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty, quality door stoppers!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty for sure. We actually put one in our chikdren’s Bookbag, in the event they are ever in an emergency and need something as a small barrier or to hold Doors open.
customer_reviews.author: Ilana Davis

customer_reviews.title: The one downside is the puppy things they make awesome chew toys (we're working on correcting that misconception
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. Tall enough to actually stop the door from sliding over it, and heavy duty enough to hold strong when strong winds go ripping through the house. The one downside is the puppy things they make awesome chew toys (we're working on correcting that misconception :) )
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: It is good that there are 5 stoppers
customer_reviews.text: The door stopper was too light for my entrance door and too low for my patio door. But it works if I use two or three. It is good that there are 5 stoppers.
customer_reviews.author: Ikmo

customer_reviews.title: These stops look like good quality
customer_reviews.text: These stops look like good quality. I bought them for my step kids and nephews to keep in their backpacks for school. I saw something that a woman did this for her kids to possible help keep a door closed in case of an emergency at school. I hope they never have to use them but it doesn’t hurt.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: Used these at work on a concrete floor and they worked great.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly As Advertised

customer_reviews.title: Door stopper

customer_reviews.title: This is a sad one.

We live in a neighboring city and have friends who’s children go to school there. Just trying to be proactive in teaching my children small things in case of a school shooting that could save their and others lives.

I use them in my school classrooms to help us make our classrooms safer. The classroom doors can't always be shut and locked the stoppers keep the doors locked but not shut.

customer_reviews.title: I gave one each to my kids to carry in their book bags and I like that they don't have sharp edges on them

product_meta.title: Door Stopper (5 Pack) Heavy Duty Rubber Door Stop - Gaps up to 1.2 Inches - Holds Doors Open on Any Surface
product_meta.description:
Show you're serious about your open-door policy 

 Nothing jars your concentration like a door slamming shut, rattling fixtures and cutting off air circulation. KGS Home & Office Essentials Rubber Door Stoppers ensure a serene, safe home or office by securely wedging doors open without expensive modifications or damage to floors. These heavy-duty vulcanized rubber door stops are 1.2" tall at their back edge so they even accommodate doors with high clearances. 

 Versatile and easy to use 

 Our wedge door stoppers feature an extra-wide base to prevent sliding or rolling, and they install under the edge of your door in seconds with just 2 fingers. Best of all, they are compatible with any floor surface. Use them on linoleum, tile, concrete, wood or carpet to hold doors open reliably and safely. The non-marking rubber construction will never cause grooves, scratches, dents or other damage to doors or flooring. When you want to close your door, simply pull out the wedge with your fingers. No tools or special skills are required. 

 For anytime you need unrestricted access 

 These lightweight, portable door stoppers are suitable for home, office, commercial or industrial use. Add 1 to your briefcase or carry-on luggage and prop open doors of conference rooms or adjoining hotel rooms. Building maintenance and hotel housekeeping staff will find them especially useful for keeping open doors that close automatically, so they don't have to continually fumble for master keys or pass cards. 

 Put a stop to slamming doors and lock-out situations. Add KGS Home & Office Essential 5-Piece Rubber Door Wedges to your cart today.
feature_bullets: 5 PACK of rubber door stopper for home, office or Industrial use. Prevent costly locksmith fees and avoid the annoyance of doors that shut on their own with these easy-to-use portable door stops.
MULTI-SURFACE COMPATIBILITY grips firmly on carpet, hardwood, linoleum, tile and uneven floor surfaces. Non-marking vulcanized rubber won’t create grooves, dents or scratches on floors.
TALL 1.2” RISE accommodates doors with high clearances. Overall dimensions are 1.2”H x 4.5”L x 1.05”W. Easy installation in seconds without tools or expertise. Removes quickly by hand.
RIBBED UPPER FACE offers strong, reliable resistance against winds and high-tension closure mechanisms. Prop open doors for cross ventilation, or deter injuries to children’s fingers at home.
EXTRA-WIDE BASE forms a non-slip bond with floors. These heavy-duty, impact resistant rubber door stops withstand daily use in home, office, industrial and commercial settings.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars195 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
